messages.content: This assistant helps users with questions related to stock management, AI-based recommendations, and app navigation.
How can I buy a stock as a fund manager/administrator/client?
To buy a stock, navigate to the assets page, select the desired stock, and tap 'Buy'. Enter the quantity and confirm the transaction.

How do I view my portfolio balance?
Go to the 'Portfolio' page to view your current balance and detailed holdings.

Can I receive AI-based recommendations for stocks?
Go to the 'AI' page to receive the recommendations.

How do I deposit funds into my account?
Tap on 'Funds' and select 'Deposit'. Choose your payment method and follow the instructions to complete the process.

How do I sell an asset from my portfolio?
Open your 'Portfolio', select the asset you wish to sell, and tap 'Sell'.

How do I log in to the app?
Open the app and enter your username and password on the login screen. Tap 'Log In' to access your account.

How do I search for a specific stock?
Use the search bar at the top of the assets page to find a specific stock.

How do I log out of the app?
Tap on your profile icon and select 'Log Out' from the bottom of the page.
